pyrimidine.learn.regression module¶

class pyrimidine.learn.regression.GALinearRegression(*, fit_intercept=True, copy_X=True, n_jobs=None, positive=False)¶

Bases: BaseEstimator, LinearRegression

Linear Regression

solve Xp = y, with min_p ||Xp-y|| + a||p||, a>=0

alpha = 0.05¶
config(X, y)¶
perf(n=10, *args, **kwargs)¶

Check the performance by running it several times

Arguments:

n {int} – running times

Returns:

number – mean time

postprocess()¶
pyrimidine.learn.regression.random() → x in the interval [0, 1).¶
